  • Konstruktordetails

    • NurseDao

      public NurseDao(Connection connection)
      Implements the Interface DaoImp. Overrides methods to generate specific PreparedStatements, to execute the specific SQL Statements.

      Gibt zurück:

    • getInstanceFromResultSet

      protected Nurse getInstanceFromResultSet(ResultSet result) throws SQLException
      Maps a ResultSet of one nurse to an object of Nurse.
      Angegeben von:
      getInstanceFromResultSet in Klasse DaoImp<Nurse>
      Parameter:
      result - ResultSet with a single row. Columns will be mapped to an object of class Nurse.
      Gibt zurück:
      Object of class Nurse with the data from the resultSet.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getListFromResultSet

      protected ArrayList<Nurse> getListFromResultSet(ResultSet result) throws SQLException
      Maps a ResultSet of all nurses to an ArrayList of Nurse objects.
      Angegeben von:
      getListFromResultSet in Klasse DaoImp<Nurse>
      Parameter:
      result - ResultSet with all rows. The Columns will be mapped to objects of class Nurse.
      Gibt zurück:
      ArrayList with objects of class Nurse of all rows in the ResultSet.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      Gibt zurück:

    • getDeleteStatement

      protected PreparedStatement getDeleteStatement(long nid)
      Generates a PreparedStatement to delete a nurse with the given id.
      Angegeben von:
      getDeleteStatement in Klasse DaoImp<Nurse>
      Parameter:
      nid - Id of the nurse to delete.
      Gibt zurück:

    • getDeactivateStatement

      protected PreparedStatement getDeactivateStatement(long nid)
      Generates a PreparedStatement to mark a nurse as inactive. This is a soft-deletion by setting the active column to 'i'.
      Angegeben von:
      getDeactivateStatement in Klasse DaoImp<Nurse>
      Parameter:
      nid - ID of the nurse to deactivate.
      Gibt zurück:
      PreparedStatement to update the nurse's active status.

    • setDeleteDateStatement

      protected PreparedStatement setDeleteDateStatement(long nid)
      Generates a PreparedStatement to set the deletion and archive dates of a nurse identified by the given ID. The archive date is set to the current date, the deletion date is set 10 years in the future.
      Angegeben von:
      setDeleteDateStatement in Klasse DaoImp<Nurse>
      Parameter:
      nid - ID of the nurse to update.
      Gibt zurück:
      PreparedStatement to update the deletion and archive dates.

    • deleteExpiredNurses

      public void deleteExpiredNurses() throws SQLException
      Deletes all nurses from the database whose deletion date has passed, are not active anymore, and have a non-null deletion date. This is a hard delete.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - If an error occurs during SQL execution.
